response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $8,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $7,200. This is a significant savings, allowing you to enjoy the full value of the product without the full cost. I believe this is a fantastic opportunity for both of us, providing you with access to a high-quality product at a highly favorable price. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 7200}
